Package io.sf.carte.doc.style.css.nsac

Interface Condition2

All Superinterfaces:
Condition
All Known Subinterfaces:
ArgumentCondition
public interface Condition2
extends Condition
Updates SAC's Condition interface.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static short SAC_BEGINS_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION
    This condition checks the beginning of an attribute value.
    static short SAC_ENDS_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION
    This condition checks the end of an attribute value.
    static short SAC_PSEUDO_ELEMENT_CONDITION
    This condition checks for pseudo elements.
    static short SAC_SELECTOR_ARGUMENT_CONDITION
    This condition checks the selector list argument to which a pseudo-class applies.
    static short SAC_SUBSTRING_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION
    This condition checks a substring of an attribute value.

  • Field Details

    • SAC_BEGINS_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION

      static final short SAC_BEGINS_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION
      This condition checks the beginning of an attribute value. Example: 
         [restart^="never"]
      See Also:
      AttributeCondition, Constant Field Values

    • SAC_ENDS_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION

      static final short SAC_ENDS_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION
      This condition checks the end of an attribute value. Example: 
         [restart$="never"]
      See Also:
      AttributeCondition, Constant Field Values

    • SAC_SUBSTRING_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION

      static final short SAC_SUBSTRING_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION
      This condition checks a substring of an attribute value. Example: 
         [restart*="never"]
      See Also:
      AttributeCondition, Constant Field Values

    • SAC_SELECTOR_ARGUMENT_CONDITION

      static final short SAC_SELECTOR_ARGUMENT_CONDITION
      This condition checks the selector list argument to which a pseudo-class applies. Example: 
         :not(:visited,:hover)
      See Also:
      ArgumentCondition, Constant Field Values

    • SAC_PSEUDO_ELEMENT_CONDITION

      static final short SAC_PSEUDO_ELEMENT_CONDITION
      This condition checks for pseudo elements. Example: 
         ::first-line
   ::first-letter
      See Also:
      AttributeCondition.getLocalName(), Constant Field Values
